patterns: Can i get your phone number
responses: You can contact at: 0175 239 3021

patterns: what are the courses offered in your college?
responses:
Our university offers: 
1. Chemical Engineering, 
2. Civil Engineering, 
3. Computer Engineering, 
4. Electrical Engineering, 
5. Electronics and Communication Engineering, 
6. Electronics Instrumentation and Control Engineering, 
7. Electronics and Computer Engineering, 
8. Mechanical Engineering, 
9. Mechatronics, 
10. Biotechnology.

patterns: what is the fee of each semester
what is the fees of each year
What is the fees of hostel
fees for Ac room for girls
fees for non-Ac room for girls
fees for Ac room for boys
fees for non-Ac room for boys
responses: University fees per semester is around 1.5-2 lacs.And hostel fees ranges between Rs.40500-70000 depending upon the type of accomodation.
The old campus is situated at Bhadson road, Patiala, Punjab and the new one in Derabassi.

patterns: how far is hostel from college
responses: There are about 9 boys hostels(A, B, C, D, H, J, K, M, O) and 7 girls hostels(E, G, I, L, N, Q, PG). Hostel capacity varies. The distance of campus from boys hostel is about 10-15 mins walk and for girls it is 5-10 mins walk.

patterns: list of events organised in college
list of events conducted in college
What events are conducted in college
Are there any event held at college
responses: College organises various events every semester. Some of the famous events are Saturnalia, izhaar, tff, etc.

patterns: documents needed at the time of admission
documents required at the time of admission
What document are required for admission
Which document to bring for admission
what documents do I need for admission
responses: Admission apllication form, 10+2 marksheet with atleast 75% in PCM/PCB, JEE Mains admit card and result card, Undertaking by students and parents, medical fitness certificate, character certificate, migration certificate, income certificate of parents
The College is spread across 250 acres.

patterns: does the college have library facility
responses: The university has a large library called "Nava Nalanda Central Library". It has variety of books for both academics and leisure reading which can be issued for a particular period of time. It also has Group Discussion rooms for group studies and project making.
Our University has Excellent Infrastructure. Campus is clean. Good IT Labs With Good Speed of Internet connection. You may also visit https://tiet360.in/ for campus tour.

patterns: Is there a cafetaria in college
responses: Our university has a canteen in every block with variety of food options available
To know about placement visit here

patterns: what is the name of principal
responses: Dr. Padmakumar Nair is the college director.
Academic calender is provided by the dean of academic affairs. Usually, the semester durations are: January to June for odd semester and August to December for even semester.

patterns: do we have to wear uniform
responses: Descent dress code must be followed, there is no particular uniform provided.

patterns: how long will be the vacation
responses: Academic calender is provided via an email by DOAA. Odd semester usually starts from August and ends in December, while the even semester is from January to May.

patterns: please provide sports and games information
responses: Our university encourages all-round development of students and hence provides sports facilities in the campus. For more details visithere

responses: We are Proud to tell you that our college provides ragging free environment, and we have strict rules against ragging
